Package.Name: org.citra.canary.osx
Package.Title: Citra Canary
Package.Description: An in-development version of Citra that uses changes that are relatively untested. (osx, commit: canary-1787, release date: 2020-06-20)

Package.Name: org.citra.nightly.osx
Package.Title: Citra Nightly
Package.Description: The nightly builds of Citra are official, tested versions of Citra that are known to work. (osx, commit: nightly-1588, release date: 2020-07-07)
